title: when a take a picture and look at it, it is still for a split second then starts moving like a very short two or three second clip and then starts over again. How do I make the stop?
content: My phone is a Google pixel 2XL, I was not given that choice to choose from when choosing what type of phone I had. I found out through Verizon, that there was was it called when new features can be added in you enter that into your phone. I can't think of the word! I think this happened a little bit before that process took place, but now it happens all the time when I take a picture. Please help!
